arts.ttl: Marshall Munetsi reveals Wolves' gameplan for Everton clash
arts.sum: He continues: “We’ve got to try and put a lot of pressure on them, because if we start very well, as you’ve seen in the last game at home, we did push a lot when we played West Ham in the cup game. Marshall Munetsi has been a fixture of Vitor Pereira’s starting lineup so far this season.

arts.ttl: Wolves vs Everton – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Wolves and Everton meet at Molineux on Saturday, each seeking momentum as the Premier League season settles. Vítor Pereira’s Wolves are still without a point after two defeats, but a dramatic midweek cup win has injected some optimism. arts.sum: Wolves host Everton at Molineux on Saturday in a crucial fixture, with Vítor Pereira’s side desperate to secure their first points of the Premier League season. After two opening defeats, the pressure is on, but a dramatic midweek cup victory over West Ham has lifted the mood around the club. arts.ttl: Everton XI vs Wolves – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Everton travel to Molineux on Saturday aiming to make it three consecutive victories in all competitions. After a shaky league start, David Moyes’ side have recorded back-to-back 2-0 wins in the league and cup.
